DOC.brief_summary: Voltaren being a Non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) drug may be used as a single drug therapy in otitis externa being both therapeutic and analgesic thus reducing consumption of oral analgesia.
DOC.detailed_description: anticipated advantages are: reduction of inflammation and edema, no fungal overpopulation- when steroids are employed, contains boric acid as an ingredient, high safety profile, can be switched to antibiotic therapy later, can be used in conjunction wit steroids
DOC.criteria: Adults having otitis externa as single diagnosis mild to moderate Diabetes Children Pregnant women Immune compromise Starting other treatment Moderate to severe otitis externa
